This is a good start to a README.md file for a Node.js module.  Here's a revised version with improvements for clarity, conciseness, and best practices:

```markdown
# micromark-util-html-tag-name

[![Build Status](https://github.com/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name/workflows/main/badge.svg)](https://github.com/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name/actions)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/micromark-util-html-tag-name.svg)](https://npmjs.com/package/micromark-util-html-tag-name)
[![Bundle Size](https://bundlephobia.com/result?package=micromark-util-html-tag-name)](https://bundlephobia.com/result?package=micromark-util-html-tag-name)

A utility package providing lists of HTML tag names for use with [micromark](https://github.com/micromark/micromark).  This allows micromark to parse HTML elements correctly.


## Installation

```bash
npm install micromark-util-html-tag-name
```

or using ESM:

```javascript
import { htmlBlockNames, htmlRawNames } from 'micromark-util-html-tag-name';
```


## Usage

```javascript
import { htmlBlockNames, htmlRawNames } from 'micromark-util-html-tag-name';

console.log(htmlBlockNames); // Output: ['address', 'article', ...]
console.log(htmlRawNames);   // Output: ['pre', 'script', ...]
```

## API

This package exports two constant arrays:


### `htmlBlockNames`

An array of lowercase HTML block-level tag names.  These names are used with more relaxed parsing rules for HTML block-level elements.  Refer to the [CommonMark Spec](https://spec.commonmark.org/0.30/#html-blocks) for details.

### `htmlRawNames`

An array of lowercase HTML "raw" tag names.  These tags allow for preserving whitespace content within the tag's boundaries.  Refer to the [CommonMark Spec](https://spec.commonmark.org/0.30/#html-blocks) for details.


## Compatibility

This package is compatible with Node.js versions supported by [micromark](https://github.com/micromark/micromark).  See [micromark's compatibility section](https://github.com/micromark/micromark) for details.


## Contributing

See the [contributing guide](https://github.com/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.


## License

[MIT License](https://github.com/micromark/micromark-util-html-tag-name/blob/main/LICENSE)
```
